title: PyTorch built without distributed support
body_html:
🐛 Bug

Traceback (most recent call last):
File "test_dist.py", line 4, in
dist.init_process_group(backend="nccl", init_method="file:///distributed_test", world_size=2, rank=0)
File "C:\Anaconda\lib\site-packages\torch\distributed_init_.py", line 73, in init_process_group
raise RuntimeError("PyTorch built without distributed support")
RuntimeError: PyTorch built without distributed support

Environment

  • PyTorch Version :0.4.1 py36_cuda92_cudnn7he774522_1
  • OS : Windows10
  • How you installed PyTorch: conda
  • Python version: Anaconda 3.6.7
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: 9.2
  • GPU models and configuration: GTX1080

body:
## 🐛 Bug

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test_dist.py", line 4, in <module>
    dist.init_process_group(backend="nccl", init_method="file:///distributed_test", world_size=2, rank=0)
  File "C:\Anaconda\lib\site-packages\torch\distributed\__init__.py", line 73, in init_process_group
    raise RuntimeError("PyTorch built without distributed support")
RuntimeError: PyTorch built without distributed support


## Environment
 - PyTorch Version :0.4.1 py36_cuda92_cudnn7he774522_1
 - OS : Windows10
 - How you installed PyTorch: conda
 - Python version: Anaconda 3.6.7
 - CUDA/cuDNN version: 9.2
 - GPU models and configuration: GTX1080
